about_the_game:
STORY

Begin an adventure in a post-apocalyptic world hit by a natural anomaly that emerged through a portal in one of the underground laboratories.

Some of humanity was able to take refuge in bunkers built by several corporations, one of which is "Silos Corp". The rest either became infected or continue to fight for survival in the vast overgrown and dangerous wasteland, where there are no past rules apply.

Take on the role of a special forces fighter named Martin Grylls and infiltrate a certain Silo 24, from which an emergency signal has been received.

Immerse yourself in a deep plot filled with intriguing characters, each with their own stories, and uncover the main secret of Silo 24 that divided Martin's life into before and after.

EXPLORATION

Explore linear abandoned locations of the bunker, laboratory, city, village, roads, forests and other eerily picturesque places, collecting resources and finding safe paths.

QUESTS AND PUZZLES

On your journey, you will encounter various obstacles and challenges, which can always be overcome by using ingenuity or strength to move toward your goal.

INFECTED

Bloodthirsty zombies, monsters and titans roam around, infected with mutated bioluminescent plants that came from another universe through a portal.

SURVIVAL

Always be on guard, because danger lurks around every corner. Armed with a variety of weapons, both firearms and melee, enter the fight for survival.

HORROR

In the dark corridors of the dead bunker you will find fascinating glowing plants, but this does not mean that the situation is safe. This is not your territory, and you are not welcome here.

SEARCH

Search enemies, cupboards, safes, and other objects to find items needed to solve puzzles, restore health, ammunition and acquire weapons.

NOTES

Find notes from survivors and not-quite-alive travelers with the inhabitants, which help shed light on the local stories, events and places.

DRIVING

Between key locations you will have to travel on several types of transport depending on the situation and the local landscape.

CHOICE

Are you ready for a serious test of the post-apocalypse? Then welcome to Silo 24. Make a choice and find answers in a ruined world to try to save the planet!

KEY FEATURES

  • Deep game universe

  • Exciting adventure

  • Interesting story with references

  • Fresh look at the apocalypse

  • English voice acting

  • Detailed atmospheric levels

  • Thoughtful quests and puzzles

  • High-quality first-person shooter

  • Crowds of walking dead

  • Unique terrible monsters

  • Strong anomalous titan bosses

  • Extensive arsenal of weapons

  • Several types of transport

  • Stylized 3D graphics

name: The Silo 24

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Silo 24 is a story-driven first-person action adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a natural anomaly. You are a special forces fighter, and your task is to infiltrate the abandoned Silo 24 to uncover all its secrets and make a decisive choice.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
